{{Wired embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=OpenRD |revision=Client |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=10-14 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF084G2M |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1108ACBG-8E-E |ram1_num=4 |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=Elpida |ram2_model=E5116AJBG-6E-E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=7 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON25 |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, VGA Display Adapter;XGI;Volari Z11;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Cirrus Logic;CS42L51;;1;,,, RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MAX3221;;1;,,, Dual USB to Serial UART;FTDI;FT2232D;;1;,,, 3.3V 20Mbps RS485/RS422 Transceiver;Linear Tech;LTC2852;;1;,,, I2C Bus Repeater;NXP;PA9515A;;1;,,, 1K Microwire Compatible Serial EEPROM;Microchip;93LC46B;;1;,,, Dual SPDT Bi-Directional Analog Switch;Fairchild;FSA2257;;1;,,, Quad 3-State Noninverting Buffer;ON Semiconductor;MC74HC125A;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1;,,, 1MHz, 7.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, 12V, 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;NDT452AP;;1;,,, High efficiency ultrafast diode;STMicro;STTH802;;1;,,, |flags=VGA out, 3.5mm audio output, Audio in (3.5mm), RS232, RS485, SDHC, SMBUS, SPI, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.19 |stock_os=Linux;3.1.10-13 |tp_firmware=Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), |oui_eth=00:50:43 }} [https://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/t-openrdcdetails.aspx Product Page]
===Third party firmware=== *[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/kirkwood/openrd/install/ ''Debian installer for OpenRD''] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/openrd ''archlinux|ARM OpenRD'']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 886281 @ 1.2GHz *Video: XGI Volari Z11 VGA w/64MB RAM *Memory: 512MB *Storage: 512MB NAND, SDHC Card, SATA II, eSATA *Network 2x 10/100/1000 Ethernet *USB: 7x USB 2.0 *Power Source: 12V/5A via DC power
